item.title: Holes
item.description: A boy is sent to a juvenile work camp as punishment after being mistakenly arrested.

item.title: Kingsman: The Secret Service
item.description: A secret British spy agency unravels a billionaire’s evil plot

item.title: No Reservations
item.description: A NY City chef and her recently adopted niece adapt to their life together

item.title: The French Dispatch
item.description: Authors for a New Yorker-esque magazine report on a small town in France

item.title: About
item.description: This is a blog that I’ve wanted to start for a long time! I create it with two goals in mind. First, I want to jot down and share my thoughts about movies as I have them. I normally have a pretty clear opinion about movies right after I watch them, but then cannot remember clearly all the little things I was thinking after about a week. I hope to use this blog to track those ideas while they’re still fresh.
